wxExViMacros Class Reference

Offers the macro collection, and allows recording and playback to vi (ex) component. More...

Detailed Description

Offers the macro collection, and allows recording and playback to vi (ex) component.

Member Function Documentation

bool wxExViMacros::Playback ( wxExEx *  ex,
const wxString &  macro,
int  repeat = 1 
)

Plays back macro a number of repeat times on the ex component.

Returns true if all records could be executed.

void wxExViMacros::Record ( const wxString &  text,
bool  new_command = true 
)

Records text to current macro as a new command.

The text to be recorded should be valid ex command, though it is not checked here. If you playback this macro the text is sent to the ex component to execute it, and then should be a valid command.

Parameters:
texttext to record
new_commandnormally each record is a new command, if not, the text is appended after the last command
void wxExViMacros::StartRecording ( const wxString &  macro)

Starts recording a macro (overwrites existing macro if macro starts with lower case).
